News

  • 3/10/2004 - Retroweaver 1.0 RC1 Released - Release Candidate 1 of Retroweaver Version 1 has just been released. This first initial release contains support for all JDK1.5 features aside from enumerations and annotations.

  • 3/17/2004 - Retroweaver 1.0 RC3 Released - Release Candidate 3 of Retroweaver Version 1 has just been released.

  • 3/22/2004 - Retroweaver 1.0 RC4 Released. This release contains more support for optimization of autoboxing and new support for java.lang.Iterable and java.lang.Enum.

  • 3/24/2004 - Retroweaver 1.0 RC5 Released. This is a bug fix release.

  • 10/12/2004 - Retroweaver 1.0 FCS Released. This is the final 1.0 release of Retroweaver coinciding with the JDK 1.5 FCS release.

  • 1/19/2005 - Retroweaver 1.1 Released. This is primarily a new feature release, with support for reference verification, an ant task, and a separate runtime jar.

Download the latest version of Retroweaver now
